description:
Vegetarian Done Right is a comprehensive, step-by-step course on making the easy transition to a meatless (or less meat) diet. It consists of multiple, easy-to-digest videos and supplementary recipes that you can watch at your own pace.

Why should I take this course?

What if you could make a small change in the way you eat that would lead you to having more energy, more stamina, feeling great, looking great, and living longer?

If your health isn't where it should be; if you're suffering from high blood pressure, heart disease, obesity, or other diseases, you should take this course.

If you want to lose a few pounds and nothing else has worked, you should take this course.

If you find you don't have as much energy as you used to, you should take this course.

If you want to help save the lives of millions of animals PER DAY and safeguard the environment, you should definitely take this course.

This one course could change the rest of your life.

How long will it take me to watch this?

Most of my students watch the lectures (each about 10 minutes) over the course of a couple weeks, but you could consume the entire course in a day or two if you were really motivated.

What am I getting by purchasing this course?

The course is divided up into three main sections:

  1. Introduction to Vegetarianism; Why Make the Change and the Basics on How to Do It
  2. Cooking for Yourself and Your Family at Home
  3. Going Out to Eat, Holidays, and Other Social Occasions
title: Vegetarian Done Right
